item.title: 扎克伯格就有关 Instagram 和 WhatsApp 交易的电子邮件作证

item.title: 芝加哥大学商学院获得 1 亿美元捐赠

item.title: 吸引年轻女性的能量饮料— 和行业巨头摄氏度
item.description: 今年 1 月洛杉矶发生野火期间，影响力人物悉尼-西姆斯（Sydney Sims）在 TikTok 上发布了一段视频，讲述了她从好莱坞的家中撤离时购物的情景。她在 Target 购物车里放了一盒蛋白质棒、宠物食品和一些猫咪玩具。她说："现在我们正在寻找必需品— AKA, Alani，"然后她从商店的冰箱里拿了一箱 Alani Nu 能量饮料和两罐罐装饮料准备上路。【原文：During the LA wildfires in January, influencer Sydney Sims posted a video on TikTok of shopping for what she needed to evacuate from her home in Hollywood. Into her Target cart went a box of protein bars, pet food and a few toys for her cats. “Now we’re trying to find the essentials — AKA, Alani,” she said before grabbing a case of the energy drink Alani Nu, plus two cans from a store fridge for the road.】
